byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Rye, Sussex, Eng, cables Rye, N Y, asking haven, village bd studies ways and means to extend aid
snippet: RYE, N.Y ., July 1--A special meeting of the village board of trustees here tonight decided that further information would be required before this village would undertake to care for women and children refugees from the "mother community" of Rye, ...

headline.main: RYE DELAYS AIDING NAMESAKE ABROAD; Trustees Ask More Data Before Accepting Refugees

lead_paragraph: RYE, N.Y ., July 1--A special meeting of the village board of trustees here tonight decided that further information would be required before this village would undertake to care for women and children refugees from the "mother community" of Rye, England, as ...
